conversation.message_text:
Custom Gold Grillz: 
Keep your grillz looking new all year. Clean it, store it, protect it.

SHOP NOW
customgoldgrillz.attn.tv/axZeNe1bOcIL 

 Text STOP to stop

Custom Gold Grillz: 
Customize your drip. Pick the cut, the metal, the shine.

START HERE
customgoldgrillz.attn.tv/aD6GjctoAyk9 

 Text STOP to stop

Custom Gold Grillz: 
Want something they can't copy? You have to start with opal.

SHOP CUSTOM OPAL
customgoldgrillz.attn.tv/a7mZqGwaJ9mn 

 Text STOP to stop

Custom Gold Grillz: 
Skip basic gifts. Moissanite grillz hit harder than diamonds.

SHOP MOISSANITE
customgoldgrillz.attn.tv/aCkXj47b43Fz 

 Text STOP to stop

Custom Gold Grillz: 
Our Vday sale just dropped. Get 15% off sitewide with code VDAY15.

SHOP NOW
customgoldgrillz.attn.tv/aa-kyL_GqCA0 

 Text STOP to stop
Custom Gold Grillz: Hey Brandon we noticed you checking us out. Have you seen our best sellers yet? https://customgoldgrillz.attn.tv/aKD_qVLH-zxv  Text STOP to stop
No, I've been waiting for my grills to come in the mail. It's been two months so can I get an update?

Custom Gold Grillz: Thanks for getting in touch! I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. This definitely isn't the experience we wanted for you! Are you referring to Order #131990? If so, I can see that it has been delivered on Dec 23, 2025. If you haven't received it, the best way to handle this is to email us directly at support@customgoldgrillz.com or give us a call at (415) 413-4915, Monday - Friday 9 am - 5 pm PST. Our team is happy to help!
Yes, that's the order but I sent that back in the molds and I never got the grill back
Template used: "Customer support"; last updated: 2024-03-11 16:27:15.398

Custom Gold Grillz: Thanks for the confirmation! The best way to handle this is to email us directly at support@customgoldgrillz.com or give us a call at (415) 413-4915, Monday - Friday 9 am - 5 pm PST. Our team is happy to help!

send_to_cs: Send to CS immediately if cx did not receive their order
Send to CS immediately for post purchase inquiries about the status of the mold, or issues with the molds
Send to CS for pricing inquiries
Send to CS if cx is looking for a more specific piece not available on the website
Send to CS if cx is asking for a code and we don't have one
escalate: No escalations for this client, send everything to CS
tone: Use Teeth instead of Pieces (e.g 8 teeth at the top)
templates: If the image is not coming through a second time, send Broken Image temp
For CUSTOM GRILLZ & ACCESSORIES INQUIRIES for models not available on the website use PS shortcut
For urgent concerns/delayed escalation response use PS shortcut
For delayed orders and the customer is frustrated use PS shortcut
For customer service use shortcut CS which has both the direct email/number
dos_and_don_ts: Do not use the order history as a reference to order status
If customers want to cancel their order always ask for the reason for cancellation
drive_to_purchase: Don't recommend pre-made grillz! Upsell to fitted and custom grillz
When recommending an item, let the cx know they can customize their order on the product page
When recommending an item, ask the cx if they are working with a budget
Use LFG shortcut to gather information and provide recommendations when cx ask about:

Single Stone Gap Filler Grillz - Sterling Silver / R2
Single Stone Gap Filler Grillz - Sterling Silver / R1

conversation.message_text: Igloo: Welcome to Igloo! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.
Igloo: Hey this is Sarah, how can I help you?
Hi we have an Igloo cooler that we love and the hinge broke, we are trying to buy a replacement part

Igloo: I'm so sorry to hear that! For our available replacement hinges for coolers, you may check here: https://igloo.attn.tv/aVkIrUUAvnBP

Can you please let me know what model of Igloo Cooler do you own? I'll be happy to check this for you.

send_to_cs: Send to CS for legal and fraud related inquires
Send to CS for product safety inquires and threats
Send to CS for website technical issues
escalate: ESC if cx claims bodily injury as result of a product
ESC if cx highlights dangers to health/safety as a result of product
templates: For all post-purchase & warranty inquiries use "SUPPORT" temp (SPT)
For discount code issues use "SUPPORT" temp (SPT)
For product info that you can't find on the site use "SUPPORT" temp (SPT)
If cx reach out about 90 qt cooler recall, use shortcut RCC
For custom order cancellation and edit requests, don't use CED, use the designated templates instead

conversation.message_text: Oral-B: Welcome to Oral-B! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.

Oral-B: Hey! I'm Sam with Oral-B and Crest! Just wanted to say thanks for joining. If you're looking for great savings check out our Deals page! https://oral-b.attn.tv/az7wU5cVRA6C 

Text me any time with questions!
Register new toothbrush
Oral-B: I'm happy to help! You can register your product at the following link: https://oral-b.attn.tv/alsBVpGS6eyo
Tried x2 and both times got 'error. Try again later'
Template used: "The Site Won't take my Card - All brands"; last updated: 2023-10-10 16:56:54.019
Template used: "Site won't work - All brands"; last updated: 2025-07-16 17:54:02.115

Oral-B: Thanks for letting me know, and I'm sorry for the inconvenience. First, I might suggest trying to open the site in an incognito or private window to rule out any browser cache or extension issues. Let me know how that goes.

important: When sending a link, if you see a "/" at the end of the URL, remove it
send_to_cs: Send to CS for damaged items that aren't available on the website
escalate: ESC immediately if the order is delivered, but cx did not receive it
ESC if cx wants to use an expired code
ESC sales end date questions
ESC invalid codes / expired code issues
Before ESC for retroactive discount requests, check if the item is on sale or if they met the minimum
Don't make suggestions of replacements - if unsure, ESC
ESC false advertising complaints
ESC if cx state they regret placing the order after the CANCEL/ORDER temp has been sent
Before ESC products not functioning properly
→ Inquire what exact brush/product they have
→ Provide any user guides available
Don't ask for the cx's shipping address as secondary info, include their phone number instead
tone: Keep messages shorter and more direct
Don't use the term "cart tracking", or let cxs know we can see what they have in their cart
templates: If the cx asks where there order is, and it's a confirmed order within the standard processing and shipping time, only share the "Order status/order tracking" temp
If the cx reaches out saying they're having issue with their code, first use CWW temp
If cx needs assistance with brush function/operations use FOQ shortcut
For product complaints/bad experiences use PBE shortcut
If cx says they're dentists/hygienists & want to shop use RDH shortcut
If cx is a short amount away from reaching the $100 threshold for the welcome discount to apply use SRT shortcut
If cx ask why their order was canceled, use MOC shortcut
If cx purchased from their dentist and looking for rebate ($30, $20, $10 back) use RBT shortcut
For post-purchase issues with Amazon orders, use PS shortcut
For post-purchase issues where cxs are dental professionals, dentists, hygienists, use DPS shortcut
dos_and_don_ts: If customers are looking for brush heads always confirm what type of brush they have, iO or non iO
If you can't find the products on the website, refer to this one https://crest.com/en-us
Hold to policy and do not offer to check if deviation from policy is acceptable
If customers ask about the warranty registration code OR say it's not accepting theirs (they might refer to it as a promo code for registration)- send them this one OB59185 (it's always the same)
drive_to_purchase: For general recommendations use CFR shortcut
Always refer cxs to iO series products, when possible
promo_and_promo_exclusions: The $85 welcome promo code isn't for % off, once applied a free item is added to the cart
Please check the last letters of a code to determine when they were sent
→ I.e. WCOBDC means it is a December code (DC) and will likely expire in Jan
Discount codes do not work on Amazon
If cx is looking for a discount on replacement brush heads, encourage to subscribe for savings on the product page

escalation_preferences: All product complaints or bad experiences with a product

conversation.message_text: R+Co: Add us to your contacts and never miss out on our latest news, offers and style tips.
R+Co: Welcome to R+Co! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply STOP to cancel.

R+Co: Thanks for joining! Your code for 15% OFF is HELLO15. Click here to shop now: rco.attn.tv/a8eSHCGK2NJB 

You also now have access to our text concierge Lesley! You can message them here anytime with questions while you shop.
R+Co: Add us to your contacts and never miss out on our latest news, offers and style tips.

R+Co: ICYMI: 15% off your first order when you enter code HELLO15 at checkout. rco.attn.tv/a_zb1JLEF8Ev 

Was there anything I could help you find? 
- Lesley

R+Co: Hi Annette, Thank you for purchasing HIGHEST VOLUMIZING MOUSSE. 

Let us know what you think and receive 10% OFF your next order: rco.attn.tv/a_qQ1-9z5_8G

R+Co: Hey Annette, still thinking it over? Your picks are still in your cart. Finish checking out: rco.attn.tv/amhdD36bhs2F

I'm here if you have any questions!
- Lesley

R+Co: Don't forget to complete your purchase of INGENIOUS THICKENING Shampoo & Conditioner Set before it's gone! 
rco.attn.tv/a5oZ771kcogI
My order for the shampoo set was $83.00 and now it is showing up as $93.  What happened??
R+Co: I'm sorry to hear that! Do you mind sharing a screenshot of your cart so I can check on this?
Can you please answer my question?  Thank you.
Template used: "Did I order already? - All brands"; last updated: 2023-10-10 16:42:51.099
Template used: "Product too expensive / Why did you increase your prices? "; last updated: 2022-10-28 14:49:49.281

R+Co: Thank you for reaching out, and I apologize for the inconvenience. Kindly note that in the last year, we did increase our prices to keep up with rising prices globally and to not compromise the integrity of our formulas. We hope you understand this and will come back and shop with us again. That being said, we would love to have you signed up for our emails and texts so you can take advantage of any of our promotions.

escalate: ESC retroactive discount/price adjustment inquiries immediately
ESC discount code issues
ESC if stylists/salons want to carry the products
templates: For any q's about affiliate links, commissions, or salon referral links, use AFQ shortcut
All of the products are unisex, use USX shortcut
drive_to_purchase: Ask the cx what their hair concerns are before making a recommendation!
Make recommendations when cx has specific inquiry, don't send the quiz!
For full haircare regimen inquiries, recommend shampoo, conditioner, and at least one or two other products recommended that align with their need
promo_and_promo_exclusions: When sending a code provide more detail about what the code is valid for!
When sending the promo/code end date, include the time the offer expires as well!
